content: salmanpot: Worked on three open PRs this month, including Twitter/X sporting trends plugin (#971), KM Eliza tweet automation (#968), and KM Eliza bot (#1169), with no merged contributions yet. Made substantial code changes across 21 files (+961/-447 lines) in 6 commits, primarily focused on feature development (83%). Activity was sporadic, being active on only 2 days this month.
